record.title: EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - September 25, 2007)

[Page: S12017]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of the leader, I ask unanimous consent that the time for morning business be extended to 11:45 a.m. today under the same conditions and limitations as previously ordered.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
